original_text: Now when we had discovered Cyprus, we left it on the left hand, and sailed into Syria, and landed at Tyre: for there the ship was to unlade her burden.
korean_text: 구브로를 바라보고 이를 왼편에 두고 수리아로 항해하여 두로에서 상륙하니 거기서 배의 짐을 풀려 함이러라

sentences.original_text: Now when we had discovered Cyprus
we left it on the left hand
for there the ship was to unlade her burden
sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 그 배가 짐을 부리게 되어있었기 때문입니다
